languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над клавишами — и дергается словно от удара тока. Его шея выгибается, вы видите, как шевелятся его губы... Когитатор начинает издавать рык, нарастающий с каждой секундой...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над клавишами — и дергается словно от удара тока. Его шея выгибается, вы видите, как шевелятся его губы... Когитатор мигает {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменами{/g} — и все его экраны взрываются, обдавая вас градом осколков и выпуская на волю омерзительную тварь, которая каким-то непостижимым образом была заточена внутри.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над клавишами — и дергается словно от удара тока. Его шея выгибается, вы видите, как шевелятся его губы... Когитатор начинает издавать рык, нарастающий с каждой секундой...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lumens wink in and out on the cogitator — and all its screens explode, showering you in a hail of fragments, and releasing the heinous beast that was somehow imprisoned within.{/n}
{n}Lumens wink in and out on the cogitator — and all its screens explode, showering you in a hail of fragments, and releasing the heinous beast that was somehow imprisoned within.{/n}
{n}Lumens wink in and out on the cogitator — and all its screens explode, showering you in a hail of fragments, and releasing the heinous beast that was somehow imprisoned within.{/n}

Lumens wink in and out on the cogitator — and all its screens explode, showering you in a hail of fragments, and releasing the heinous beast that was somehow imprisoned within.{/n}

{n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumens{/g} wink in and out on the cogitator — and all its screens explode, showering you in a hail of fragments, and releasing the heinous beast that was somehow imprisoned within.{/n}

{n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希俯下身子，之后突然退了一步，仿佛遭到电击一般。他的头不自然地朝后仰着，你看到他的嘴唇在颤动……沉思者咆哮着，声音变得越来越响……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希俯下身子，之后突然退了一步，仿佛遭到电击一边。他的头不自然地朝后仰着，你看到他的嘴唇在颤动……思考器咆哮着，声音变得越来越响……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se inclina sobre las teclas... y retira la mano, como si se hubiera electrocutado. Su cabeza se gira de forma antinatural, y ves que sus labios se mueven... El cogitador emite un rugido cada vez más fuerte...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se inclina sobre las teclas... y retira la mano, como si se hubiera electrocutado. Su cabeza se gira de forma antinatural, y ves que sus labios se mueven... El cogitador emite un rugido cada vez más fuerte...{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはキーの上にかがみ込み…まるで電気ショックを受けたかのようにたじろいだ。頭が不自然に後ろに倒れ、唇が動くのが見える…考算機の唸り声が、一層大きくなる…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはキーの上にかがみ込み…まるで電気ショックを受けたかのようにたじろいだ。頭が不自然に後ろに倒れ、唇が動くのが見える…考算機の唸り声が、一層大きくなる…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über die Tasten – und zuckt zusammen wie durch einen elektrischen Schlag. Sein Kopf klappt unnatürlich nach hinten, und du siehst, wie sich seine Lippen bewegen ... Das Brüllen des Cogitators wird mit jeder Sekunde lauter ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über die Tasten – und zuckt zusammen wie durch einen elektrischen Schlag. Sein Kopf klappt unnatürlich nach hinten, und du siehst, wie sich seine Lippen bewegen ... Das Brüllen des Cogitators wird mit jeder Sekunde lauter ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'Heinrix se penche sur le clavier, il tressaille comme s'il avait reçu une décharge électrique. Sa tête s'incline rigidement vers l'arrière, et vous voyez ses lèvres bouger... Le cogitateur rugit de plus en plus fort...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'Heinrix se penche sur le clavier, il tressaille comme s'il avait reçu une décharge électrique. Sa tête s'incline rigidement vers l'arrière, et vous voyez ses lèvres bouger... Le cogitateur rugit de plus en plus fort...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, anahtarların üzerine eğilip ardından da elektrik çarpmış gibi tepki veriyor. Başı, gayritabii bir hareketle dikeliyor ve dudakları hareket etmeye başlıyor... Kavramsayardan gitgide yükselen bir kükreme sesi çıkıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the keys — and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally, and you see his lips moving... The cogitator lets out a roar that grows louder by the second...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, anahtarların üzerine eğiliyor ve elektrik çarpmış gibi tepki veriyor. Başı, gayritabii bir hareketle dikeliyor ve dudakları hareket etmeye başlıyor... Kavramsayardan gitgide yükselen bir kükreme sesi çıkıyor...{/n}
